channel.title: [BUG] I can't shoot this zombie (Apprehension) while it's feeding
channel.description:
There's a zombie chillin' here under the stairs, munching on a soldier. As I approach - while its feeding animation is playing - it can't be shot at. I fire, but the bullets don't connect. After it stands up, my shots connect normally, and it can be killed. I don't know if this is an issue with all zombies, or this zombie in particular; I'll check the next zombie I see crouching and try it out again.
